thread.title: U.S. Banks Report Record First-Quarter Profit

author: Ryan Tracy
title: U.S. Banks Report Record First-Quarter Profit
text:
WASHINGTONâ€”U.S. banks notched a record quarterly profit to start 2018, newly released data show, a result of the new tax law, rising interest rates and an improving economy.
The industry reported $56 billion in net income in the first quarter, up 27.5% from the prior-year quarter, the Federal Deposit Insurance Corp. said. The new U.S. tax law gave banks a boost, but profits still would have been $49.4 billion without it, the FDIC said.
